fehd.ADR_TC: 香港灣仔盧押道18號海德中心地下B鋪

result.adr_address: Shop B, G/F., One Capital Place, 18 Luard Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop B, G/F., One Capital Place, 18 Luard Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: Flame

reviews.text: Rob you blind.pint 35 dollars happy hour so must of charged me 300 dollars for the nice massage and quick blow job the barmaid gave me

I often drink here! Maybe three times a week!
Basically, the staff are friendly ! The price for the 
beer is very reasonable ! A good pub in Wanchai !
Highly recommended !

Good bar with decent staff and quick service. Prices are typical Wan Chai prices, so not cheap, but the drinks are on the strong side at least. They've got multiple TVs usually showing various live sports channels. The music is fine, there is obviously no live band given the size of the place. Generally it is a smallish bar and the toilet is out the back in the office block. There's only one toilet for everybody, so sometimes there is a queue. The guests vary: seems like an old man's hangout at time with groups of old age pensioners having a late night drink, but in general people are well behaved and there's seldom trouble. For those rare events they have a door man.
The best bar in wanchai to hang out till late

The prices are fair and it screams "come off the barren streets and cozy up with a pint and microwave pizza under the guise of handmade special" but what makes this place really stand out is the service. The lovely ladies of Flame have always treated me like a prince... They've called me "handsome" more times than my mom and grandmoms combined which starts to make me think there is weight behind the claim, and some days we all need that. 

I also think it's cute how they've tried to carve out a slice of "family friendly" themed grown up bars in the dark side of WanChai with their motto of "good for kids". We're not there yet team but we'll get there one day...
